name: tsxo3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)), wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))), wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))), wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))), wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: orbi2i(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2)), wxo(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wn(wb(w1, w2))), wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wn(wb(w1, w2)), wxo(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wn(wb(w1, w2)), wxo(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wb(w1, w2)), wxo(w1, w2))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w2), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(w1, wn(w2)), wxo(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w2), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical exclusive disjunction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
